summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log or roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates in July and August 2019. It lists shift assignments, days off, sick leave, and overtime for a staff member assigned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU #3). The document's date stamp (8/12/2019 9:11:27 AM) is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York from July-August 2019.
The log shows regular assignments to 'SHU #3 P/M 10' (Special Housing Unit, likely a post assignment), along with days off, sick leave, and overtime entries.
The document is dated August 12, 2019, which is two days after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody at the MCC on August 10, 2019.
The assignment pattern suggests routine staffing of the Special Housing Unit during the period surrounding Epstein's death.
No specific individuals are named in this excerpt; it appears to be an administrative roster.
